definition: to investigate/dialectical
to dispute/to debate/to argue/to discuss
to admonish/variant of 證|证[zheng4]
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
dialectics/dialectic or Socratic method of debate
dialectical materialism
pinyin: bian4 zheng4 wei2 wu4 zhu3 yi4

sentences.english: Finally, it confuses the ambit of historical determinism and historical non-determinism.
sentences.chinese: 其四，混淆机械决定论和辩证决定论的局限。

sentences.english: We must uphold the maximum programme of the Party in dialectical unity.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该在辩证统一中坚持党的最高纲领。

sentences.english: Mathematics is a dialectical unity of logic and inductive procedures.
sentences.chinese: 数学是逻辑程序与归纳程序的辩证统一。

sentences.english: The relationship of agape and mutual love is dialectic.
sentences.chinese: 圣爱和互爱之间存在着辩证关系。

sentences.english: Reform reflects the dialectical unity between human and society.
sentences.chinese: 改革体现了人与社会的辩证统一。

sentences.english: Their relation in academic activities is both contradictive and unitive.
sentences.chinese: 学术是自由探索与遵循规范的矛盾与辩证统一。

sentences.english: This paper mainly through three parts to introduce the history of dialectic thought of Lukacs.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要从三个方面来介绍卢卡奇的历史辩证法思想。

sentences.english: Alcibiades tries to find the self in a dialectical movement.
sentences.chinese: 阿希比底思设法在辩证法中找到自我。

sentences.english: The most subtle dialectics always end in nostalgia.
sentences.chinese: 最为精巧的辩证法总是结尾于怀旧。

sentences.english: The therapeutical principle of syndrome differentiation and disease differentiation should be combined.
sentences.chinese: 治疗应谨守病机，辩证与辨病治疗相结合。

sentences.english: Thus the paper is written in the meta-language of contradictory dialectic explanation.
sentences.chinese: 全文以矛盾辩证法为元语言展开解释。

sentences.english: The second part dialectically analyzes the current situation of credibility education of college students.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分辩证地分析当代大学生诚信道德教育状况。

sentences.english: Because it has two sides, we should dialectically treat it.
sentences.chinese: 因为它具有两面性，我们应该辩证地看待它。

sentences.english: Dialectic studies how opposites can become identical .
sentences.chinese: 辩证法研究对立物是怎样变统一的。

sentences.english: The systemic and overall nursing to the patient as the centre were achieved by nursing based on differentiation of symptoms and signs.
sentences.chinese: 进行辩证施护，达到以病人为中心的系统化整体护理。

sentences.english: We should look on Freud's subconsciousness theory dialectically.
sentences.chinese: 对弗洛伊德潜意识理论必须加以辩证的看待。

definition: to investigate
holistic diagnosis and treatment (TCM)
diagnosis and treatment based on an overall analysis of the illness and the patient's condition
dialectics/dialectic or Socratic method of debate
pattern-syndrome identification based on the eight principles (TCM)
Western medicine/a doctor trained in Western medicine
"eight principles," a method of giving a general description and syndrome differentiation (TCM)
actual proof/concrete evidence/empirical
interpretation of the cause/onset and process of an illness/pathogenesis
traditional Chinese medical science/a doctor trained in Chinese medicine
materialistic
monism, belief that the universe is made of a single substance
dialectical materialism
pinyin: bian4 zheng4 wei2 wu4 zhu3 yi4

definition: Chinese and Western medicine/a doctor trained in Chinese and Western medicine
epistemology (in philosophy, the theory of how we know things)

(TCM) the four methods of diagnosis, namely 望診|望诊[wang4 zhen3] (observation), 聞診|闻诊[wen2 zhen3] (auscultation and olfaction), 問診|问诊[wen4 zhen3] (interrogation), 切診|切诊[qie4 zhen3] (pulse feeling and palpation)
